title: The problem with "/n" escape sequence
body:
by **pauldinakar**: 
After using the escape sequence "/n" in the code, the preceeding output is not
starting immediately at the start of the new line but taking one 'space' extra.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
package main

import "fmt"
	

func main() {
	fmt.Println("Observe that\n","no extra space at the start if correct")
	
}



What is the expected output?

Observe that
no extra space at the start if correct

What do you see instead?

Observe that
 no extra space at the start if correct

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

sandboxed version online (tutorial)
